protein.specific_function: Involved in the bile acid metabolism. Has a preference for 24-hydroxycholesterol, and converts it into a 7-alpha-hydroxylated product.

reference.reference_text: Li-Hawkins J, Lund EG, Bronson AD, Russell DW: Expression cloning of an oxysterol 7alpha-hydroxylase selective for 24-hydroxycholesterol. J Biol Chem. 2000 Jun 2;275(22):16543-9.
